IBM B2B Integration Innovation Day
June 29th, 2016 at IBM Southfield Office, MI 48075
IBM cordially invites you and your associates to attend an Invitation Only Event focused on IBM’s latest innovations for B2B Integration. Participants will have an opportunity to learn from IBM experts about how to address the ever challenging requirements in B2B Integration. Lunch will be provided, and there will be a Hands-on Lab in the afternoon on IBM's Any to Any translation solution for both B2B, and Internal Integration.
This will be a valuable event for existing clients, and customers interested in learning more about State of The Art B2B Integration Technology.
Date:  June 29th, 2016 (Wednesday)
Time:  09:00 AM – 12:15 PM EST | Lab:  01:15 PM – 04:00 PM EST
Venue:  IBM Southfield Office – 18000 W Nine Mile Rd # 2, Southfield, MI 48075
IBM’s B2B Integration Roadmap
In this session, IBM’s Product Manager will share development plans for the B2B Integration Portfolio including Sterling B2B Integrator, Sterling File Gateway, and IBM Multi-Relationship Management.
Driving Business Impact with New B2B Integration Capabilities
Learn how to gain value from the latest features including advanced communications, health check analysis, and High Availability Mailboxing.
Leveraging Analytics to Improve B2B Operations
Learn how to use IBM’s B2B analytic solutions to improve operational control, reporting and governance for IBM’s on-premise and cloud solutions.
Sterling File Gateway Hands-on Workshop
It is designed to demonstrate the flexibility and ease of use of a powerful File Gateway Engine for B2B Integration.
Please reply to avenditti@us.ibm.com/mmadhineni@miraclesoft.com confirming the names and e-mails of attendees from your company before June 20th, 2016 (Monday). We look forward for your active participation in this valuable and content rich event.
